chat_history.content: Yes, the TrailWalker Hiking Shoes are waterproof. They are designed with a durable and waterproof construction to withstand various terrains and weather conditions.
The TrailWalker Hiking Shoes are priced at $110.
Yes, we have waterproof tents available. Can you please provide more information about the type or size of tent you are looking for?
which is your most waterproof tent?

Our most waterproof tent is the Alpine Explorer Tent. It is designed with a waterproof material and has a rainfly with a waterproof rating of 3000mm. This tent provides reliable protection against rain and moisture.
